00011         void System::sleep(uint32_t ms) {
00012 
00013                 struct timespec tv;
00014                 tv.tv_nsec = (ms % 1000) * 1000000;
00015                 tv.tv_sec = ms / 1000;
00016                 nanosleep(&tv, 0);
00017         }

00019         time_t System::currentTime() {
00020                 return time(NULL);
00021         }

00023         int32_t System::getTid() {
00024                 int32_t tid = pthread_self();
00025                 return tid & 0xFFFF;
00026         }
